Class AuxGrad

  • java.lang.Object
    • datan.AuxGrad

  • public class AuxGrad
extends java.lang.Object
    A class computing the gradient vector of a function of n variables
    Author:
    Siegmund Brandt.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AuxGrad

        public AuxGrad(DatanUserFunction muf,
       int[] list)
        Parameters:
        muf - user function which must be an extension of the abstract class DatanUserFunction.
        list - array containing the elements of a list specifying which of the n variables are fixed (list element = 0) and which are adjustable (list element = 1).

    • Method Detail

      • getGradient

        public DatanVector getGradient(DatanVector xin)
        Parameters:
        xin - position in n-space, where gradient is to be computed.
        Returns:
        gradient.
